name: yellowstone
description: famous for its geysers like old faithful and diverse wildlife.

name: acadia
description: features rocky coastlines and the tallest mountain on the atlantic coast.

name: zion
description: known for its massive red sandstone cliffs and the narrows hike.

name: yosemite
description: famous for its giant sequoias and iconic granite cliffs like el capitan.

name: grand canyon
description: one of the world's most spectacular natural wonders.

name: olympic
description: features temperate rainforests and rugged glacier-capped peaks.

name: glacier
description: known for its carved peaks and valleys that reach the canadian border.

name: everglades
description: the largest tropical wilderness in the united states.

name: arches
description: home to over 2,000 natural sandstone arches.

name: denali
description: encompasses six million acres of wild land and north america's tallest peak.

name: bryce canyon
description: known for its unique amphitheater of red-rock hoodoos.

name: shenandoah
description: located in the blue ridge mountains with cascading waterfalls.

name: devils tower
description: an astounding geologic feature that protrudes from the prairie.

name: muir woods
description: preserves one of the last remaining ancient redwood forests.

name: statue of liberty
description: an iconic symbol of freedom and democracy.
